properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 5 at 2:50AM AKST until February 6 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills will
cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
Expect wind chills as cold as 55 below zero.

* WHERE...Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys.

* WHEN...6 AM this morning to 6 AM Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chill values are expected
north of Ambler.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM AKST THURSDAY
